profile_picture_is_managed_by_ldap_serve: The profile picture is managed by the LDAP server and cannot be changed here.
click_profile_picture_to_upload_custom: Click on the profile picture to upload a custom one from your files.
image_should_be_in_format: The image should be in PNG or JPEG format.
dont_have_access_to_your_passkey: Don't have access to your passkey?
create_a_login_code_to_sign_in_without_a: Create a login code that the user can use to sign in without a passkey once.
name: Name
this_browser_does_not_support_passkeys: This browser doesn't support passkeys. Please or use a alternative sign in method.
error_occurred_with_authenticator: An error occurred with the authenticator
authenticator_does_not_support_discovera: The authenticator does not support discoverable credentials
authenticator_does_not_support_resident_: The authenticator does not support resident keys
authenticator_does_not_support_any_of_th: The authenticator does not support any of the requested algorithms
critical_error_occurred_contact_administ: A critical error occured. Please contact your administrator.
client_wants_to_access_the_following_inf: {client} wants to access the following information:
do_you_want_to_sign_in_to_client_with_yo: Do you want to sign in to {client} with your {appName} account?
view_the_groups_you_are_a_member_of: View the groups you are a member of
do_you_want_to_sign_out_of_pocketid_with: Do you want to sign out of Pocket ID with the account {username}?
please_try_to_sign_in_again: Please try to sign in again.
authenticate_yourself_with_your_passkey_: Authenticate yourself with your passkey to access the admin panel.
you_are_about_to_sign_in_to_the_initial_: You're about to sign in to the initial admin account. Anyone with this link can access the account until a passkey is added. Please set up a passkey as soon as possible to prevent unauthorized access.
if_you_do_not_have_access_to_your_passke: If you dont't have access to your passkey, you can sign in using one of the following methods.
enter_a_login_code_to_sign_in: Enter a login code to sign in.
request_a_login_code_via_email: Request a login code via email.
an_email_has_been_sent_to_the_provided_e: An email has been sent to the provided email, if it exists in the system.
enter_your_email_address_to_receive_an_e: Enter your email address to receive an email with a login code.
enter_the_code_you_received_to_sign_in: Enter the code you received to sign in.
see_your_account_activities_from_the_las: See your account activities from the last 3 months.
please_provide_a_passkey_to_prevent_losi: Please add a passkey to prevent losing access to your account.
it_is_recommended_to_add_more_than_one_p: It is recommended to add more than one passkey to avoid losing access to your account.
manage_your_passkeys_that_you_can_use_to: Manage your passkeys that you can use to authenticate yourself.
create_a_one_time_login_code_to_sign_in_: Create a one-time login code to sign in from a different device without a passkey.
username_can_only_contain: Username can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, underscores, dots, hyphens, and '@' symbols
sign_in_using_the_following_code_the_cod: Sign in using the following code. The code will expire in 15 minutes.
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_pas: Are you sure you want to delete this passkey?
name_your_passkey_to_easily_identify_it_: Name your passkey to easily identify it later.
add_a_new_api_key_for_programmatic_acces: Add a new API key for programmatic access.
for_security_reasons_this_key_will_only_: For security reasons, this key will only be shown once. Please store it securely.
name_to_identify_this_api_key: Name to identify this API key.
when_this_api_key_will_expire: When this API key will expire.
optional_description_to_help_identify_th: Optional description to help identify this key's purpose.
name_must_be_at_least_3_characters: Name must be at least 3 characters
expiration_date_must_be_in_the_future: Expiration date must be in the future
are_you_sure_you_want_to_revoke_the_api_: Are you sure you want to revoke the API key "{apiKeyName}"? This will break any integrations using this key.
